title: Ferguson commission calls for sweeping changes to deal with racial inequity
text:
15 Ferguson commission calls for sweeping changes to deal with racial inequity 
USA Today: A commission appointed by Missouri Gov. Jay Nixon in the aftermath of last yearâ€™s unrest in Ferguson, Mo., is calling for a series of sweeping steps to attack the issue of racial inequity in the St. Louis region.
